history.proof: intros h p ms xs ys H. rewrite in_app_iff in H. hauto lq: on depth: 3use: in_map_iff.

original: intros h p ms xs ys H. rewrite in_app_iff in H. destruct H as [Hin | [Hin | Hin]]. - apply in_map_iff in Hin. destruct Hin as [[dst msg] [H1 H2]]. inversion H1. split. + left. split. * apply in_map_iff. exists (dst, msg). auto. * reflexivity. + left. reflexivity. - apply in_map_iff in Hin. destruct Hin as [[dst msg] [H1 H2]]. inversion H1. split. + left. split. * apply in_map_iff. exists (dst, msg). auto. * reflexivity. + right. apply H2. - right. apply Hin.
